entry.title: The Lil Whizz Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Detox
Price: 23.00

The Lil Whizz Synthetic Urine Novelty Kit is a unisex, non-refillable, disposable 3oz belt. It comes pre-assembled and ready to use straight out of the box. It can be used for male and female testing.

How it works This gravity operated kit delivers toxin free urine samples through a rubber tube that is connected to the urine pack and held firmly against your body with a gentle, cotton belt. The urine can be easily released by releasing the two clips that block the urine from leaking from the urine pack.

Kit includes:

  • 100% cotton elastic belt
  • Urine pack (aka. bladder bag) pre-filled with 3oz of toxin and disease free premixed synthetic urine
  • Heat Pad
  • Instruction manual
  • Pro Tips Remember to always ensure synthetic urine is kept at the correct temperature (37 degrees Celsius or 98.6 degrees Fahrenheit). You can do this by:
  • Using the heating pads and temperature strips
  • Ensuring the sample is sealed correctly
  • It is being held against your skin using the Whizz Kit belt provided. If you are not using a urine belt, store synthetic urine, preferably, on your inner thigh.
  • Store urine sample against your skin until the testing.

entry.title: Rescue 5 Day Formula
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rescue Detox
Type: Detox
Price: 38.50

We live in a world where everyday we face toxins, toxins that are getting stronger, more damaging and even harder to expel. Where are these toxins coming from? They are coming form pollutants in our air, in our food and in other substances we may be putting in our bodies. Sounds scary, right? Well, luckily for us there are reliable products we can use to help remove these toxins from our bodies.

The Rescue 5 Day Permanent Detox is one of the most advance and complex detox ever created in a lab. It is specially formulated strengthen and promote the bodies ability to banish toxins from building up and causing even more harmful damaged over time.

The Rescue 5 Day Permanent Detox will cleanse your body of all present unwanted toxins if you do not introduce additional toxins during or after the cleansing process.

How it works - The Rescue 5 Day Permanent Detox contains four types of detoxifying capsules that are ingested at specific times during the cleanse to help eliminate and destroy toxic buildup in the body.

The Rescue 5 Day Permanent Detox now includes the new ICE Capsules that can be taken after the completion of the five-day detox for extra piece of mind.

Kit Includes:

  • Head Start Formula = 4 capsules
  • Morning Formula = 30 capsules
  • Evening Formula = 30 capsules
  • Rescue ICE Caps = 8 capsules

Important Note: The Rescue 5 Day Permanent Detox is intended for people who weight less than 200lbs or who have high toxin levels.

This product has been assessed by Health Canada and is deemed to be safe, effective and high quality.

NPN 80043249

Made in the USA

entry.title: Detox ICE Capsules
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rescue Detox
Type: Detox
Price: 19.90

The Rescue Detox ICE Capsules is made for those who do not like to consume cleansing beverages. It is also one of the strongest temporary detox products by Rescue Detox. They contain no artificial ingredients and are loaded will super fruits to help neutralize harmful toxins.

How to use - Take four capsules with a 16oz of water, then wait 15 minutes before taking the next four capsules with another 16oz of water. Repeat process until you have finished all the capsules. Note: it will take approximately 90 minutes for this product to take effect. Cleansing will last for approximately 5 hours.

Kit Includes:

  • ICE CAPS = 12 Capsules

Pro Tips - for best results, do not consume toxins during the use of this product, drink plenty of water, urinate frequently and take on an empty stomach.

Important Note - Rescue Detox ICE Capsules are designed for people over 200lbs or who have extreme toxin levels.

This product has been assessed by Health Canada and is deemed to be safe, effective and high quality.

NPN 80043249

Made in the USA
